CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "100 - UF"), Quote.Opportunity.Account.Discount_OEM__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "101 - NF"), Quote.Opportunity.Account.Discount_OEM__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "102 - MF"), Quote.Opportunity.Account.Discount_OEM__c, NULL)))
CustomField.label: OEM Discount
